DataSet

Import with:

from alphastats import DataSet

DataSet

class DataSet(loader, metadata_path: Optional[str] = None, sample_column=None)[source]

Analysis Object

check_loader(loader)[source]

Checks if the Loader is from class AlphaPeptLoader, MaxQuantLoader, DIANNLoader, FragPipeLoader

Parameters:

loader – loader

check_matrix_values()[source]
create_matrix()[source]

Creates a matrix of the Outputfile, with columns displaying features (Proteins) and rows the samples.

load_metadata(file_path, sample_column)[source]

Load metadata either xlsx, txt, csv or txt file

Parameters:

  • file_path (str) – path to metadata file

  • sample_column (str) – column name with sample IDs
